SELECT `user`.user_id, `user`.username, `user`.phone, `user`.email, `user`.avatar, `user`.enterprise_id AS enterpriseId, `user`.dept_id AS deptId, `user`.job_id AS jobId, `user`.create_time, `user`.update_time, `user`.del_flag, `user`.lock_flag, e.enterprise_name AS enterpriseName, d.dept_name AS deptName, j.job_name AS jobName FROM sys_user AS `user` LEFT JOIN sys_enterprise e ON e.id = `user`.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON d.dept_id = `user`.dept_id AND d.enterprise_id = `user`.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN sys_job AS j on j.job_id=`user`.job_id
and `user`.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ew.username},'%')
and `user`.enterprise_id in
#{item, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and `user`.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY `user`.create_time DESC
